an10.220:1.1: Atha kho annataro brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an10.220:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.220:1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti”ti?
an10.220:1.4: “Adhammacariyavisamacariyahetu kho, brahmana, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti”ti.
an10.220:2.1: “Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti?
an10.220:2.2: “Dhammacariyasamacariyahetu kho, brahmana, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti.
an10.220:3.1: “Na kho aham imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanami.
an10.220:3.2: Sadhu me bhavam gotamo tatha dhammam desetu yathaham imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajaneyyan”ti.
an10.220:3.3: “Tena hi, brahmana, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
an10.220:3.4: “Evam, bho”ti kho so brahmano bhagavato paccassosi.
an10.220:5.1: Kathanca, brahmana, tividha kayena adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti …pe…
an10.220:5.2: evam kho, brahmana, tividha kayena adhammacariya visamacariya hoti.
an10.220:6.1: Kathanca, brahmana, catubbidha vacaya adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti …pe…
an10.220:6.2: evam kho, brahmana, catubbidha vacaya adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti.
an10.220:7.1: Kathanca, brahmana, tividha manasa adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti …pe…
an10.220:7.2: evam kho, brahmana, tividha manasa adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti.
an10.220:7.3: Evam adhammacariyavisamacariyahetu kho, brahmana, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
an10.220:9.1: Kathanca, brahmana, tividha kayena dhammacariyasamacariya hoti …pe…
an10.220:9.2: evam kho, brahmana, tividha kayena dhammacariyasamacariya hoti.
an10.220:10.1: Kathanca, brahmana, catubbidha vacaya dhammacariyasamacariya hoti …pe…
an10.220:10.2: evam kho, brahmana, catubbidha vacaya dhammacariyasamacariya hoti.
an10.220:11.1: Kathanca, brahmana, tividha manasa dhammacariyasamacariya hoti …pe…
an10.220:11.2: evam kho, brahmana, tividha manasa dhammacariyasamacariya hoti.
an10.220:11.3: Evam dhammacariyasamacariyahetu kho, brahmana, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti.
an10.220:12.2: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
